connector.description:
Receive all messages that people send to your Telegram bot.

To create a bot, contact the @botfather account using the Telegram app.

camel.kamelet.telegram-source.authorizat.name: camel.kamelet.telegram-source.authorizationToken
camel.kamelet.telegram-source.authorizat.description: The token to access your bot on Telegram. You you can obtain it from the Telegram @botfather.
